0: Welcome to the first day of training, Heist Meister. Please move to the next objective marker. Use the [W] [A] [S] [D] keys to move.
1: Good job. Open the door ahead of you with a click of the mouse. You need to be close to the door.
2: As you can see, it's fucking dark. Remember that darkness is your friend. If you need to see stuff, press the [SPACE] button.
3: Collect the briefcase by walking over it.
